ValidationRule.description: Outbound Type - Returned to Habitat must have a Close Date for Completion
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Outbound_Referral', ISCHANGED(animalos__Stage__c), ISPICKVAL(animalos__Stage__c ,'Completed'), ISPICKVAL(animalos__Outbound_Type__c, 'Returned to Habitat'), ISBLANK(animalos__Scheduled_Date_Time__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must set a Schedule Date to Complete this referral.
